job.name: &JOB_RUN_FILE_NAME;
job.command:
starver &STAR_VER; source &CODE_DIR;/scripts/setup.csh
cp &CODE_DIR;/runlists/&JOB_RUN_FILE_NAME; &OUT_DIR;/lists/&JOB_RUN_FILE_NAME;.lis
setenv RUNLIST &OUT_DIR;/lists/&JOB_RUN_FILE_NAME;.lis setenv OPTIONS `echo &STANA_OPTIONS; | sed 's/_/ /g'` setenv OPT_JETS `echo $OPTIONS | awk '{print index($0,"--jets")}'` setenv COMMAND "./stana -f $RUNLIST $OPTIONS"
if ($OPT_JETS == 0) ln -s &OUT_DIR;/jets/&JOB_RUN_FILE_NAME;_jets.root cp -r &CODE_DIR;/.&STAR_HOST_SYS; . cp -r &CODE_DIR;/build/stana . ls -al
echo echo "OUT_DIR: " &OUT_DIR; echo "CODE_DIR: " &CODE_DIR; echo "JOB_RUN_FILE_NAME: " &JOB_RUN_FILE_NAME; echo "STAR_VER: " &STAR_VER; echo "STAR_HOST_SYS: " &STAR_HOST_SYS; echo "STANA_OPTIONS: " &STANA_OPTIONS; echo "LOG_DIR: " &LOG_DIR; echo echo "VBASYM_DIR: " $VBASYM_DIR echo "VBASYM_RESULTS_DIR: " $VBASYM_RESULTS_DIR echo "STAR: " $STAR echo "FILELIST: " $FILELIST echo "RUNLIST: " $RUNLIST echo "OPTIONS: " $OPTIONS echo "OPT_JETS: " $OPT_JETS echo "SCRATCH: " $SCRATCH echo "pwd: " `pwd` echo "COMMAND: " $COMMAND echo
`$COMMAND`
# Remove files and links if ($OPT_JETS == 0) rm &JOB_RUN_FILE_NAME;_jets.root chmod 664 *_hist.root *_jets.root *_tree.root *.ps chmod 664 &OUT_DIR;/&LOG_DIR;/&JOB_RUN_FILE_NAME;.log touch &OUT_DIR;/&LOG_DIR;/&JOB_RUN_FILE_NAME;.log rm -fr ./.&STAR_HOST_SYS; rm -fr ./stana
echo "End of stana: tralala"
